name: asp_mvc
description: - la 1 lop ke thua tu lop controller: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Controller - Action trong controller la 1 phuong thuc public ( ko duoc static ) - Action tra ve bat ky kieu du lieu nao, thuong la IActionResult - Cac dich vu injection vao controller qua ham tao ## view  - la file.cshtml - view cho Action luu tai: "/View/ControllerName/ActionName.cshtml" - Them thu muc luu tru view: ``` // {0} -> ten action // {1} -> ten controller // {2} -> ten areas  options.ViewLocationFormats.Add("/MyView/{1}/{0}" + RazorViewEngine.ViewExtension); ``` ## Truyen du lieu sang view  - Model - ViewData - ViewBag - TempData
